name: Trash Man (Micron_Flash)
description:
The peaceful life of a simple raccoon is shattered when a group of vicious monsters attack their junk yard. It's up to you to defend your home and defeat the invaders using the power of scrap metal and discarded items. Customize your gear with upgrades as you fight. Only you can save the day!

Need help with how to play the game? Check out the "How To Play" section in the menu to view helpful tutorials.

Game difficulty can be adjusted in the settings menu. 

Best enjoyed in full screen
